body_html:
The removal code dates back to:

commit b5dc36f278fc296e8b9cd4f4f826f4840907b60e
Author: Soumith Chintala <soumith@gmail.com>
Date:   Sat Dec 31 10:30:36 2016 -0500

    explicitly linking against v1 libs to avoid lua-torch conflicts (#386)

Now that luatorch is dead maybe we can get rid of all of this code.

body:
The removal code dates back to:

```
commit b5dc36f278fc296e8b9cd4f4f826f4840907b60e
Author: Soumith Chintala <soumith@gmail.com>
Date:   Sat Dec 31 10:30:36 2016 -0500

    explicitly linking against v1 libs to avoid lua-torch conflicts (#386)
```

Now that luatorch is dead maybe we can get rid of all of this code.
